skins.selfIntroduction: I am Gnevny-class destroyer Grozny. I was part of convoys, laid mines, and provided shore firing support at one point. Call for me if you have orders, comrade Commander. And if you'll let me indulge in some drinks, I'll be delighted.
skins.acquisition: §Ù§Õ§â§Ñ?§Ó§ã§ä§Ó§å§Û§ä§Ö, comrade Commander. I am Gnevny-class destroyer Grozny, reporting for duty... What is the matter, comrade Commander? The item in my right hand? This is my lovely §Ü§â§à§Ý§Ú§Ü. It's a cute §å§Ò§Ú§Û§è§Ñ.
skins.login: *burp*... Hello, comrade Commander. You followed my scent? Then how about a drink?
skins.details: Lifting my lovely §Ü§â§à§Ý§Ú§Ü really does make comrade Commander behave. Just as Chapayev said.
skins.secretaryIdle1: *burp*... Say, comrade Commander, do you know anyone else who drinks this? One with bunny ears? Interesting...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Those "Four Unbreakables" are a cool bunch. I wish I could join them, but that's not possible 'cause that would ruin the naming convention. Very unfortunate.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I don't like foxes or invaders, 'cause they both try to take my home from me. Once they show up, you must drive them away.
skins.secretaryTouch: Comrade Commander, is this snack my reward for my hard labor...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: §Ü§â§à§Ý§Ú§Ü bites when it gets angry. Well, not so much bite as slice... I guess.

skins.shipDescription: Comrade Commander, are you here to see my room? Hm? That §º§å§ä§Ü§Ú isn't funny? Then how about... did my room come to see you, comrade Commander?
skins.acquisition: Comrade Commander, are you here to see my room? Hm? That §º§å§ä§Ü§Ú isn't funny? Then how about... did my room come to see you, comrade Commander?
skins.login: No need to drop off my rations today, comrade Commander. I'm not sleepy yet.
skins.details: Hold on a second. Humph... Alright, I welcome you to my abode... The Manjuu looks nervous? Why's that?
skins.secretaryIdle1: *burp*... Drinking from a can doesn't feel the same...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Comrade Commander, this exercise is surprisingly fun since I don't need to do any thinking. You should try it too.
skins.secretaryIdle3: The ball and chain? It doesn't weigh much. See? Oh, sorry for startling you...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I don't have my §Ü§â§à§Ý§Ú§Ü, so I'll have to use this ball and chain.
